channel.title: Dock on AppleShare IT
channel.description: Recent content in Dock on AppleShare IT

item.title: How to use dockutil in a script
item.description: Now that dockutil has been rewritten in Swift for macOS 12.3 compatibility, I needed to dust off my scripts. dockutil is supporting macOS 11 Big Sur or higher. Don’t forget to look at the USAGE section in the readme or use the --help option to read more about the usage and options. Luckily, not much is needed to be dusted off. However, I wanted to add some adjustments and share my workflows which you can use within Jamf.
